classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: ARTS 331.
description: Expands the general techniques of ARTS 331 with emphasis on experimentation and development of personal style. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: ARTS 331.
label: Jewelry Metals V
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graphic Design or Crafts or History of Art or Photography or Industrial Design or Painting or Sculpture or Art Education or New Media major(s).
